thread.title: Watch: Little girl tries to convince her dad that her Barbie told her to cover her in nail polish
thread.title_full: WTF | Watch: Little girl tries to convince her dad that her Barbie told her to cover her in nail polish - entertainment.ie

author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: Watch: Little girl tries to convince her dad that her Barbie told her to cover her in nail polish
text:
Kids will say anything to pass the blame.
On one hand, watching this little girl trying to improv that her Barbie told her to paint them all with nail polish is entertaining in the way that watching kids try to do anything that they're not equipped for is funny.
But then on the other hand there's a tiny part of us that gets a Shining 'red rum' vibe and we're slightly creeped out by the thought of an army of Barbies telling a little girl what to do. So much so that it could probably be a box office smash if someone was to make that a movie.
OH WAIT THEY DID .
Via YouTube
